original_title: Obama supports Newsom redistricting to counter Texas gerrymandering | Fox News
article_summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom is proposing a redistricting plan to add more Democratic seats in the state, which former President Barack Obama supports as a response to Republican gerrymandering in Texas. The plan is intended to counter a move by Texas over congressional redistricting ahead of the midterm elections, and has been met with opposition from California Republican lawmakers.</s>
